Supported Files

These file types are supported for both still images and image sequences:

Name File Extensions Notes
Cineon .cin Only 10-bit RGB files are currently supported
DPX .dpx Only 10-bit RGB files are currently supported
IFF - Generic interchange file format .iff, .z Read-only
JPEG - Joint photographic experts group file format .jpeg, .jpg, .jfif
OpenEXR .exr
PNG - Portable network graphics file format .png
PPM - NetPBM file format .ppm
RLA - Wavefront file format .rla, .rpf Read-only
SGI - Silicon Graphics file format .sgi, .rgba, .rgb, .bw Read-only
TGA - Targa file format .tga Read-only
TIFF - Tagged image file format .tif, .tiff

These file types are supported for movies:

Name File Extensions Notes
FFmpeg .avi, .dv, .gif, .flv, .mkv, .mov, .mpg, .mpeg, .mp3, .mp4, .m4v, .mxf, .wav, .webp Read-only

Opening Files

You can open files by using the file browser, dragging and dropping files onto the application window, or listing them on the command line.

Opening files with the file browser:

  1. Open the "File" menu
  2. Click the menu item "Open"
  3. Navigate to the directory where your files are
  4. Click on a file thumbnail

Recent Files

You can open recently used files from the recent files browser:

  1. Open the "File" menu
  2. Click the menu item "Recent"
  3. Click on a file thumbnail
